Date: Tuesday, 1/31/2019
Subject: Rodolfo Gonzalez injured during offseason
Hello Manager,
he played basketball and got into a nasty collision.
Diagnosis: Pulled Achilles Tendon.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 9-10 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor
